briefTitle: Oleogel-S10 in Wound Healing of Split-Thickness Skin Graft Donor Sites (BSG-12)
officialTitle: Open, Blindly Evaluated, Prospective, Controlled, Randomized, Multicenter Phase III Clinical Trial to Compare Intra-individually the Efficacy and Tolerance of Oleogel-S10 Versus Standard of Care in Accelerating the Wound Healing of Split-Thickness Skin Graft Donor Sites
summary: The main purpose of this phase III clinical trial was to show safety and efficacy of Oleogel-S10 in accelerating the wound healing of Split-Thickness Skin Graft (STSG) donor sites.

primaryOutcome.measure: Intra-individual Difference in Time to Wound Closure
